content: उद्वाहन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} That which raises or draws up (in <ab>comp.</ab>); घटीयंत्रं सलिलोद्वाहनं प्रहेः <ls>Ak.</ls> --नं {@--1@} Lifting up. {@--2@} Ploughing a field twice. {@--3@} Marriage. {@--4@} Anxiety, anxious regret. --नी {@--1@} A cord, rope. {@--2@} A small shell, {%cowarie%} (वराटिका).
